channel.title: CVE Feed for ManageEngine -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ManageEngine -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-43473|2024-08-03T13:32:59.643Z -- manageengine -- opmanager
item.description: A blind XML External Entity (XXE) vulnerability exists in the Add UCS Device functionality of ManageEngine OpManager 12.6.168. A specially crafted XML file can lead to SSRF. An attacker can serve a malicious XML payload to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-49334|2024-08-02T21:53:45.017Z -- manageengine -- adaudit%20plus
item.description: Zoho ManageEngine ADAudit Plus versions below 7271 allows SQL Injection while exporting a full summary report.

item.title: CVE-2023-49333|2024-08-02T21:53:45.406Z -- manageengine -- adaudit%20plus
item.description: Zoho ManageEngine ADAudit Plus versions below 7271 allows SQL injection in the dashboard graph feature.

item.title: CVE-2023-49332|2024-08-02T21:53:45.011Z -- manageengine -- adaudit%20plus
item.description: Zoho ManageEngine ADAudit Plus versions below 7271 allows SQL injection while adding file shares.

item.title: CVE-2023-49335|2024-08-02T21:53:44.995Z -- manageengine -- adaudit%20plus
item.description: Zoho ManageEngine ADAudit Plus versions below 7271 allows SQL injection while getting file server details.

item.title: CVE-2023-49331|2024-08-02T21:53:44.930Z -- manageengine -- adaudit%20plus
item.description: Zoho ManageEngine ADAudit Plus versions below 7271 allows SQL injection in the aggregate reports search option.

item.title: CVE-2023-49330|2024-08-02T21:53:45.218Z -- manageengine -- adaudit%20plus
item.description: Zoho ManageEngine ADAudit Plus versions below 7271 allows SQL Injection while getting aggregate report data.

item.title: CVE-2024-5678|2024-08-02T15:40:34.779Z -- manageengine -- applications%20manager
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine Applications Manager versions 170900 and below are vulnerable to the authenticated admin-only SQL Injection in the Create Monitor feature.

item.title: CVE-2024-36037|2024-08-02T03:30:12.993Z -- manageengine -- adaudit%20plus
item.description: Zoho ManageEngine ADAudit Plus versions 7260 and below allows unauthorized local agent machine users to view the session recordings.

item.title: CVE-2024-36036|2024-08-02T03:30:12.993Z -- manageengine -- adaudit%20plus
item.description: Zoho ManageEngine ADAudit Plus versions 7260 and below allows unauthorized local agent machine users to access sensitive information and modifying the agent configuration.

item.title: CVE-2024-36038|2024-08-02T03:30:12.484Z -- manageengine -- opmanager
item.description: Zoho ManageEngine ITOM products versions from 128234 to 128248 are affected by the stored cross-site scripting vulnerability in the proxy server option.

item.title: CVE-2024-21775|2024-08-01T22:27:36.266Z -- manageengine -- exchange%20reporter%20plus
item.description: Zoho ManageEngine Exchange Reporter Plus versions 5714 and below are vulnerable to the Authenticated SQL injection in report exporting feature.

item.title: CVE-2024-21791|2024-08-01T22:27:36.320Z -- manageengine -- adaudit%20plus
item.description: Zoho ManageEngine ADAudit Plus versions below 7271 allows SQL Injection in lockout history option. Note: Non-admin users cannot exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-5678|2024-08-01T06:54:25.601Z -- manageengine -- applications%20manager
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine Applications Manager versions 170900 and below are vulnerable to the authenticated admin-only SQL Injection in the Create Monitor feature.

item.title: CVE-2024-6748|2024-07-29T20:22:16.154Z -- manageengine -- opmanager
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine OpManager, OpManager Plus, OpManager MSP and RMM versions 128317 and below are vulnerable to authenticated SQL injection in the URL monitoring.

item.title: CVE-2024-6748|2024-07-29T16:20:16.449Z -- manageengine -- opmanager
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine OpManager, OpManager Plus, OpManager MSP and RMM versions 128317 and below are vulnerable to authenticated SQL injection in the URL monitoring.

item.title: CVE-2024-38872|2024-07-26T17:30:23.932Z -- manageengine -- exchange%20reporter%20plus
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine Exchange Reporter Plus versions 5717 and below are vulnerable to the authenticated SQL injection in the monitoring module.

item.title: CVE-2024-38871|2024-07-26T17:29:42.911Z -- manageengine -- exchange%20reporter%20plus
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine Exchange Reporter Plus versions 5717 and below are vulnerable to the authenticated SQL injection in the reports module.

item.title: CVE-2024-38870|2024-07-17T16:48:58.815Z -- manageengine -- opmanager%2C%20opmanager%20plus%2C%20opmanager%20msp%2C%20opmanager%20enterprise%20edition
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine OpManager, OpManager Plus, OpManager MSP and OpManager Enterprise Edition versions before 128104, from 128151 before 128238, from 128247 before 128250 are vulnerable to Stored XSS vulnerability in reports module.

item.title: CVE-2024-27311|2024-07-17T10:52:45.823Z -- manageengine -- ddi%20central
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine DDI Central versions 4001 and prior were vulnerable to directory traversal vulnerability which allows the user to upload new files to the server folder.

item.title: CVE-2024-5471|2024-07-17T10:56:53.675Z -- manageengine -- ddi%20central
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine DDI Central versions 4001 and prior were vulnerable to agent takeover vulnerability due to the hard-coded sensitive keys.

item.title: CVE-2024-36038|2024-06-24T13:18:16.339Z -- manageengine -- opmanager
item.description: Zoho ManageEngine ITOM products versions from 128234 to 128248 are affected by the stored cross-site scripting vulnerability in the proxy server option.

item.title: CVE-2024-27312|2024-06-13T15:53:35.964Z -- manageengine -- pam360
item.description: Zoho ManageEngine PAM360 version 6601 is vulnerable to authorization vulnerability which allows a low-privileged user to perform admin actions. Note: This vulnerability affects only the PAM360 6600 version. No other versions are applicable to this vulnerability.

item.description: Zoho ManageEngine PAM360 is vulnerable to Stored XSS vulnerability. This vulnerability is applicable only in the version 6610.

item.description: Zoho ManageEngine ServiceDesk Plus versions below 14730, ServiceDesk Plus MSP below 14720 and SupportCenter Plus below 14720 are vulnerable to stored XSS in the Custom Actions menu on the request details. This vulnerability can be exploited only by the SDAdmin role users.

item.description: Zoho ManageEngine ADSelfService Plus versions below 6401 are vulnerable to the DOS attack due to the malicious LDAP query.
